list.key: the downturn in the homebuilding industry
list.abs: the downturn in the homebuilding industry has shaved nearly a percentage point off GDP growth in the past year , but the curtailment of new supply has not been enough to restore balance to the housing market .建筑业的下滑已经导致了去年GDP增速下降1个百分点，但新增供应的减少仍不足以维持楼市的供需平
